scripts.dev:heatmap: cross-env PORT=3001 BROWSER=none npm --prefix external/heatmap-client start
scripts.dev:heatmap:only: concurrently -n heatmap,heatmap-api -c magenta,yellow "npm run dev:heatmap" "npm run dev:heatmap:server"
scripts.dev:mf: concurrently -n planetary,heatmap -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:planetary" "npm run dev:heatmap"
scripts.dev:mf:full: concurrently -n planetary,heatmap,heatmap-api -c cyan,magenta,yellow "npm run dev:planetary" "npm run dev:heatmap" "npm run dev:heatmap:server"
